name: Cat
loyalty: A cat is an independent creature that tolerates its owner's company. While not as obedient as a dog, a well-treated cat will return home and may bring 'gifts' of dead vermin. Cats are useful for keeping rodent populations in check.

specialAbilities.name: Keen Smell
specialAbilities.description: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

specialAbilities.name: Mouser
specialAbilities.description: Keeps rodent populations in check. A cat in a dwelling prevents vermin infestations and can detect the presence of rats or similar creatures.

specialAbilities.name: Stealthy Companion
specialAbilities.description: The cat has +4 to Stealth checks and can scout small areas (under doors, through windows) without attracting attention.
